dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S126 IS: To provide a permanent deduction for State and local general sales taxes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Heller (for himself, Ms. Cantwell, Mr. Enzi, Mr. Thune, Mr. Cornyn, Mrs. Murray, Mr. Nelson, and Mr. Alexander) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To provide a permanent deduction for State and local general sales taxes.

section.header: Permanent extension of deduction for State and local general sales taxes

subsection.text: Subparagraph (I) of section 164(b)(5) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended by section 105 of the Tax Increase Prevention Act of 2014, is amended by striking , and before January 1, 2015.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2014.
